rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Provides a welcoming entry space with natural light and minimalistic Scandinavian decor. Vastu principles: entrance aligned with auspicious direction.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open-plan living area that merges seamlessly into the kitchen space, characterized by ample natural light and clean lines. Scandinavian design emphasizes functionality and warmth with neutral colors.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen
rooms.description: Efficient layout integrating modern appliances and storage solutions within the Scandinavian aesthetic. Vastu guidelines ensure proper ventilation and energy flow.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area, offering a dedicated space for meals with ample seating, natural lighting, and decor that complements the farmhouse style.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace designed for productivity, featuring ergonomic furniture and a north-facing window to promote clarity as per Vastu principles. Minimalist Scandinavian elements are incorporated.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional and well-lit, designed with Scandinavian simplicity in mind. Vastu: located near the kitchen but with proper plumbing design.
